_header: At Constantinople in that City / Dwelled a Merchant
_description: A miracle of Our Lady: the Virgin Mary goes surety for a merchant — eighty-eight couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
At Constantynnoble in þat CiteDwelled a Marchaunt of herte
                    fre…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And þat hit mote so beSeiþ alle Amen Par charite.
                    AMEN.
